I Love You is a 2023 Indian Hindi-language romantic thriller film written and directed by Nikhil Mahajan. Produced under the banner of Jio Studios, it features Pavail Gulati, Rakul Preet Singh and Akshay Oberoi. An unofficial remake of the 2007 American horror drama P2, it was released for streaming on 16 June 2023 in JioCinema to mixed reviews from critics.[1]

Plot

[edit]

Satya, a highly accomplished corporate executive, eagerly envisions a bright future with her fianc√©. However, her life takes a sudden twist when, on the verge of boarding a flight to Delhi, she finds herself inexplicably trapped within the office premises. As the night unfolds, Satya encounters a series of alarming challenges and mysteries.

Cast

[edit]

Pavail Gulati as Rakesh Oberoi

Rakul Preet Singh as Satya Prabhakar

Elisha Jeetu Jawrani as Young Satya

Akshay Oberoi as Vishal Kapoor

Kiran Kumar as Anthony

Prateek Pachori as Watchman

Sharad Jadhav as Driver Mishra Ji

Shivani Singh as Neha; Satya's friend

Production

[edit]

The film was announced by Jio Studios featuring Pavail Gulati, Rakul Preet Singh, Akshay Oberoi.[2] The principal photography of the film started in 2022 and was wrapped in 2023.[3][4]

Release

[edit]

The film digitally premiered on 16 June 2023 on JioCinema.[1] Rakul Preet Singh promoted the film on Bigg Boss OTT 2.[5]

Soundtrack

[edit]

I Love YouSoundtrack album by

Shor Police and Gaurav Chatterji

Released16 June 2023GenreFeature film soundtrackLength14:06LanguageHindiLabelSaregama

The film's music is composed by Shor Police and Gaurav Chatterji.

Reception

[edit]

Prateek Sur of Outlook India gave the series 1/5 stars.[6] Namrata Thakker of Rediff.com rated the series 1/5 stars.[7] Aishwarya Vasudevan of OTT Play rated the series 1.5/5 stars.[8] Archika Khurana of The Times of India rated 3 out of 5 stars.[9]

The series was reviewed by Firstpost,[10] Hindustan Times[11] and The Hindu.[12]
